thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Verso Corp Qtrly Net Income $36 Million Versus $8 Million

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Verso Corp Qtrly Net Income $36 Million Versus $8 Million
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Verso Corp:
* REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND YEAR END 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* SEES Q1 2018 SALES $610 MILLION TO $625 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 NET SALES OF $610 MILLION - $625 MILLION
* FOR Q1 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES ARE EXPECTED TO BE APPROXIMATELY $10 MILLION
* SEES 2018 NET SALES TO BE GREATER THAN 2017 * FOR 2018 , SEES CAPITAL EXPENDITURES TO BE $60 MILLION - $70 MILLION
* QTRLY NET INCOME $36 MILLION VERSUS $8 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
